title: Loading Indicators
excerpt: Designing effective loading states to improve perceived performance.
content:
Loading indicators inform users that a process is ongoing and content is being loaded. They play a crucial role in managing user expectations and reducing perceived wait times.

Types of Loading Indicators

  • Spinners
  • Progress bars
  • Skeleton screens
  • Animated placeholders

Best Practices

  1. Use appropriate indicators for different loading scenarios
  2. Provide context about what's loading
  3. Consider using engaging animations to distract from wait times
  4. Ensure loading indicators are accessible and don't cause visual discomfort
  5. For longer loads, consider showing progress or estimated time
